alert.note: Alert for Cass; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Scott, southwestern Sangamon, southeastern Cass and Morgan Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arenzville, or 7 miles south of Beardstown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Virginia, Winchester, Alexander, Ashland, Waverly, Meredosia, Bluffs, Franklin, Murrayville, Woodson, Chapin, Arenzville, Manchester, Alsey, Naples, Exeter, Literberry, South Jacksonville and Philadelphia. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 43 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois.
